name: Jimjar
skill: Deception +5, Insight +4, Investigation +5, Perception +6, Persuasion +5, Sleight of hand +4, Stealth +4
languages: any two languages, Gnomish, Terran, Undercommon

trait.name: Cunning Action
text: On each of its turns, Jimjar can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
text: Jimjar deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Jimjar that isn't incapacitated and Jimjar doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: <$title_short_name$>'s innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC <$spell_dc__int$>). <$title_short_name$> can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 6
